# Batchfile for uploading oprun files from /work/tests/sweep_framework/results_export/
# This will upload all files starting with "oprun_" (typically oprun_*.json files)
# a batchfile in the context of SFTP is a text file that contains a series of SFTP commands to be executed in sequence like a script.
lcd tests/sweep_framework/results_export/
lpwd
pwd
# Upload all oprun files from the local results_export directory to server home directory
mput -f oprun_*.json

# List files to verify upload
ls -hal oprun_*.json
